metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14466 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The GOsa_Filter_Settings cookie in GONICUS GOsa 2.7.5.2 is vulnerable to PHP objection injection, which allows a remote authenticated attacker to perform file deletions (in the context of the user account that runs the web server) via a crafted cookie value, because unserialize is used to restore filter settings from a cookie.

criterions.comment: gosa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
